abstract: Arizona Coyotes and city of Glendale, Ariz, agree to amend their lease agreement temporarily.
lead_paragraph: The Arizona Coyotes and the city of Glendale agreed to amend their lease agreement, although the deal may be only a temporary fix in the team’s ongoing attempts to remain in the city.

headline.main: Arizona Coyotes’ Lease Deal Is Amended

snippet: The Arizona Coyotes and the city of Glendale agreed to amend their lease agreement, although the deal may be only a temporary fix in the team’s ongoing attempts to remain in the city.
